solution_line_template: He increased his back squat to {initial_back_squat_weight}+{increase_amount}=<<{initial_back_squat_weight}+{increase_amount}={new_back_squat_weight}>>{new_back_squat_weight} kg
That means his front squat is {new_back_squat_weight}*{front_squat_ratio}=<<{new_back_squat_weight}*{front_squat_ratio}={front_squat_weight}>>{front_squat_weight} kg
So he can do a triple with {front_squat_weight}*{triple_percentage}=<<{front_squat_weight}*{triple_percentage}={triple_weight}>>{triple_weight} kg
So he moves {triple_weight}*{num_triples} = <<{triple_weight}*{num_triples}={total_weight_moved}>>{total_weight_moved} kg if he does three triples
